name: Drumpf: Presidential Dating Simulator
detailed_description:
Young Dreamer and White House intern, Larry Lopez, is in for the fight of his life after making a high stakes bet with the President: either convince Drumpf to fall in love with him over the course of the next three days and consummate a green card marriage, or be shot into space.

Will Larry succeed in his quest for love, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness, or find himself deported to distant stars? It's up toYOU to decide!

Featuring


  • Jaw dropping dialogue choices!
  • Lavishly illustrated 2D art!
  • Branching Paths!
  • Passionate romance!
  • Beautiful music!
  • Exotic locales including Washington, Moscow, a bathroom, and more!


*All characters depicted are 18 years of age or older.
about_the_game:
Young Dreamer and White House intern, Larry Lopez, is in for the fight of his life after making a high stakes bet with the President: either convince Drumpf to fall in love with him over the course of the next three days and consummate a green card marriage, or be shot into space.

Will Larry succeed in his quest for love, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness, or find himself deported to distant stars? It's up toYOU to decide!

Featuring

short_description: The countdown clock to annihilation keeps ticking— think you've got what it takes to seduce a fat, orange president and avoid getting shot into space?!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 975 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 / 10.7 / 10.8
  • Processor: 1.5GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 975 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 975 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 / 10.7 / 10.8
  • Processor: 2.4GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game is a work of political satire and contains adult themes and content not suitable for all ages.  This includes graphic sexual language, as well as imagery which some players may find arousing.
